With Nitro Pro you can share your files with others, no matter what platform or device theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re on, and Nitro Pro makes conversion easy. Convert one or more files to PDF with just a click or two. Reuse and repurpose PDF-based content with greater accuracy.

With Nitro ProÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s industry-leading conversion technology and array of extraction tools you can easily repurpose text and images from reports, presentations, and more for reuse in any other application. Share files with the peace of mind, knowing almost anyone on almost any machine can open, view, and review Ã¢â‚¬â€œ every time. Directly edit your PDF files more easily. Just click, and edit. Nitro Pro enables you to edit entire paragraphs with ease, automatically reflowing text as you type Ã¢â‚¬â€œ like you would in a word processor.

Nitro Pro 9 gives you a powerful set of easy-to-use tools that make working with digital documents simple, straightforward, and more cost-effective. Nitro Pro, the complete Adobe Acrobat alternative, enables you to do more with PDF through powerful tools to create, convert, edit, combine, secure, annotate, form-fill, and save 100% industry-standard PDF files. Recipient of multiple best product awards, Nitro Pro is specifically designed for the business user and makes working with PDF faster and easier than ever before!

Nitro Pro 9 FEATURES:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create + Combine: Nitro Pro 9 lets you quickly and easily create professional-quality PDF documents from any format or content type: paper scans, spreadsheets, presentations, reports, and more.
* Open, read and edit PDF files from other PDF applications, like Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader and other popular solutions.
* Create from 300+ Formats
* Combine Files to PDF
* Print to PDF
* Microsoft Office Add-ins
* Preset & Custom Profiles
* Create from Clipboard
* PDF/A and Archival
* Scan to PDF

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Edit Text + Images: Add, manipulate, replace, and correct text and images in PDF files with intuitive editing tools. Extract and delete individual pages from documents.
* Edit Text
* Edit Images
* Edit Pages
* Optimize Files
* Bookmarks and Links
* Watermarks, Headers and Footers
* Apply Bates numbering when unique page labeling and identification is required across pages.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Convert + Export. Nitro Pro 9 lets you easily reuse and repurpose text, images, or entire documents, with tools to accurately convert and extract PDF files and their content.
* PDF to Word
* PDF to Excel
* PDF to Image
* Export Text
* Export Images
* Batch Export
* Extract Pages
* Snapshot + Copy

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scan + OCR. Apply Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to image- and paper-based documents and create searchable and/or editable layers of text for digital archival.
* Searchable Text Layers
* Editable Text Layers
* Scan to PDF
* Multi-language Support
* Repurpose for Conversion

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Collaborate + Review. Review and markup PDF files faster with a range of text- and shape-based annotations. Easily involve multiple contributors with tools to track, sort, and manage individual comments.
* Compatible With Adobe
* Markup and Review
* Sort and Manage Comments
* Stamps
* Shape and Pencil Markups
* Attach Files

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sign + Certify. Electronically sign and return documents in seconds with QuickSign and streamline certifiable digital signature workflows with one-click, reusable profiles. Certify and approve documents with preset and customizable dynamic stamps that include the time, date,
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Control + Protect. Control document access and usage with individual user permissions and digital IDs. Protect confidential information using military-grade 256-bit and remove sensitive content with Redaction.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Electronic Forms. Create and distribute custom forms to gather information that are as intuitive as their paper counterparts Ã¢â‚¬â€œ but much more efficient Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and easily fill, submit, and save PDF forms

Nitro Pro 9 New Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compare two documents and output the differences on a separate document
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Measurement Tools to calculate distance, area, and perimeter.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Spellcheck available in all editable text fields and text-based annotations
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Batch Print a list of PDF files in a specified order
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Whiteout information permanently fromthe document
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Outlook Plugin to create PDFs directly fromemails, selected text and supported attachments
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Nitro Cloud Integration allows for saving, sharing, collaborating and requesting signatures between Nitro Pro 9 and Nitro Cloud

Nitro Pro 9 Enhancements:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Upgraded Interfacemaintains the Microsoft Office 2013 look and feel
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multi-Thread Rendering loads documents even quicker
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Combine Files using the drag-and-drop method and the new palette interface
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Bates Numbering can be removed easily throughout the document
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dynamic Stamps support customuploaded images
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Edit Text in a Line or Paragraph by a switch of a radio button
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Floating Toolbar when editing text
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Rotate with an improved interface
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Insert Image fromClipboard with common Ã¢â‚¬ËœPasteÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ function
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Object Tools Coordinates precisely sizes and places image
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Convert to Word can output to .DOCX file type
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Web Browser Plugins use the new Nitro Pro 9 interface
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Undo/Redo in formfields because accidents happen
